actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase and extend the energy investment tax credit for solar, wind, geothermal, and ocean thermal property.
short_title: Renewable Energy Tax Credit Act of 1983

summary.text: Renewable Energy Tax Credit Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 15 percent to 25 percent the investment tax credit for solar, wind, geothermal, and ocean thermal property. Extends such credits for five years from 1985 to 1990.

titles.title: Renewable Energy Tax Credit Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase and extend the energy investment tax credit for solar, wind, geothermal, and ocean thermal property.
